title: Domaine Gayda
content:
Can anyone help me i.d. this? Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204002411im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/gayda_5802.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Magnet logo - Armada {Florian}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204002411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42484 "Go to previous forum topic") [Orca Triathlon techno-style slanted rounded logo face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204002411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42470 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gabland

comments.content:
DOMAINE is [ITC New Baskerville](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204002411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-new-baskerville/).  
GAYDA appears to be something else, but is squooshed for sure.

<cite>DOMAINE</cite> looks more like [Baskerville Old Face](http://web.archive.org/web/20081204002411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/baskerville-old-face/baskerville-old-face/).

I can’t figure out <cite>GAYDA</cite> either.
It looks very much like a Baskerville, but there’s details that don’t match like the bottom spur on the “G”.
Man if Yves doesn’t get it, does it mean it’s custom then ?
